title: Wonder Man
overview: Simon and Trevor, two actors at opposite ends of their careers, chase life-changing roles.
reason: Backed by Marvel Studios and Disney+, this series benefits from a massive built-in fanbase. It holds a solid 7.6 IMDb rating with over 12K votes, indicating strong early audience engagement.

title: IT: Welcome to Derry
overview: In 1962, amid a spate of unexplained disappearances of local children, a group of misfit friends begin to suspect a long-buried ancient evil lurking. As the kids set out to determine what's really going on, a rising unease prompts several townspeople to work together to restore peace – all while a U.S. military operation seeks to exploit Derry for its own objectives.
reason: A highly anticipated prequel to a major horror franchise, boasting an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 71K votes. Its connection to the 'IT' universe and HBO platform ensures significant cultural relevance.

title: All Her Fault
overview: In Chicago, Marissa Irvine arrives at 14 Arthur Avenue, expecting to pick up her young son Milo from his first playdate with a boy at his new school. But the woman who answers the door isn't a mother she recognizes. She isn't the nanny. She doesn't have Milo. And so begins every parent's worst nightmare.

title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Highly acclaimed with an 87 Metacritic score and 8.1 IMDb rating from over 76K votes. Created by the renowned Vince Gilligan and starring Rhea Seehorn, it's a prestige offering on Apple TV.

title: The Beast in Me
overview: A famous author is pulled into a twisted mind game with her rich, powerful new neighbor — who might be a murderer.
reason: Featuring well-known actors Claire Danes and Matthew Rhys, this Netflix series has a respectable 7.5 IMDb rating with over 21K votes. Its strong cast and platform contribute to its broad appeal.

title: Boots
overview: After impulsively joining the U.S. Marine Corps, a bullied teen finds new purpose — and unexpected brotherhood — with his motley team of fellow recruits.
reason: This Netflix drama has garnered a strong 7.9 IMDb rating from over 22K votes. Its presence on a global platform like Netflix, combined with positive audience reception, makes it widely popular.
